018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.report;
019
020import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
021import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.CallableByActionName;
022import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.JsonState;
023import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.ActorSystemAware;
024import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
025import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
026import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRefAware;
027
028import org.json.JSONObject;
029import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
030
031import java.io.InputStream;
032import java.nio.file.Files;
033import java.nio.file.Path;
034import java.nio.file.Paths;
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.Comparator;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.Map;
039import java.util.Set;
040import java.util.logging.Logger;
041
042/**
043 * Section-based workflow report builder.
044 *
045 * <p>Assembles report sections from two sources:</p>
046 * <ol>
047 *   <li><strong>Legacy sections</strong> - Added via {@code addWorkflowInfo} and {@code addJsonStateSection}</li>
048 *   <li><strong>Child actor sections</strong> - {@link SectionBuilder} actors created as children</li>
049 * </ol>
050 *
051 * <h2>Usage with child actor sections (recommended):</h2>
052 * <pre>{@code
053 * steps:
054 *   - states: ["0", "1"]
055 *     actions:
056 *       - actor: loader
057 *         method: createChild
058 *         arguments: ["ROOT", "reportBuilder", "...ReportBuilder"]
059 *       - actor: loader
060 *         method: createChild
061 *         arguments: ["reportBuilder", "wfName", "...WorkflowNameSection"]
062 *       - actor: loader
063 *         method: createChild
064 *         arguments: ["reportBuilder", "wfDesc", "...WorkflowDescriptionSection"]
065 *
066 *   - states: ["1", "end"]
067 *     actions:
068 *       - actor: reportBuilder
069 *         method: report
070 * }</pre>
071 *
072 * <h2>Legacy usage:</h2>
073 * <pre>{@code
074 * steps:
075 *   - states: ["0", "1"]
076 *     actions:
077 *       - actor: loader
078 *         method: createChild
079 *         arguments: ["ROOT", "reportBuilder", "...ReportBuilder"]
080 *       - actor: reportBuilder
081 *         method: addWorkflowInfo
082 *
083 *   - states: ["1", "end"]
084 *     actions:
085 *       - actor: reportBuilder
086 *         method: report
087 * }</pre>
088 *
089 * <h2>Actions:</h2>
090 * <ul>
091 *   <li>{@code addWorkflowInfo} - Add workflow metadata section (legacy)</li>
092 *   <li>{@code addJsonStateSection} - Add actor's JsonState as YAML (legacy)</li>
093 *   <li>{@code report} - Build and output the report to outputMultiplexer</li>
094 * </ul>
095 *
096 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
097 * @since 2.15.0
098 */
099public class ReportBuilder implements CallableByActionName, ActorSystemAware, IIActorRefAware {
100
101    private static final String CLASS_NAME = ReportBuilder.class.getName();
102    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(CLASS_NAME);
103
104    private final List<ReportSection> sections = new ArrayList<>();
105    private IIActorSystem system;
106    private IIActorRef<?> selfRef;
107
108    /**
109     * Default constructor for use with loader.createChild.
110     */
111    public ReportBuilder() {
112    }
113
114    @Override
115    public void setActorSystem(IIActorSystem system) {
116        this.system = system;
117        logger.info("ReportBuilder: ActorSystem set");
118    }
119
120    @Override
121    public void setIIActorRef(IIActorRef<?> actorRef) {
122        this.selfRef = actorRef;
123        logger.info("ReportBuilder: IIActorRef set");
124    }
125
126    // ========================================================================
127    // CallableByActionName implementation
128    // ========================================================================
129
130    @Override
131    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String args) {
132        logger.info("ReportBuilder.callByActionName: " + actionName);
133
134        return switch (actionName) {
135            case "addWorkflowInfo" -> addWorkflowInfo(args);
136            case "addJsonStateSection" -> addJsonStateSection(args);
137            case "report" -> report(args);
138            default -> new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
139        };
140    }
141
142    // ========================================================================
143    // Actions
144    // ========================================================================
145
146    /**
147     * Adds workflow info section.
148     */
149    private ActionResult addWorkflowInfo(String args) {
150        String workflowPath = getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup();
151        if (workflowPath == null) {
152            return new ActionResult(false, "Could not get workflow path from nodeGroup");
153        }
154
155        String name = null;
156        String description = null;
157
158        // Try to read workflow YAML for name and description
159        try {
160            Path path = Paths.get(workflowPath);
161            if (!Files.exists(path)) {
162                path = Paths.get(System.getProperty("user.dir"), workflowPath);
163            }
164
165            if (Files.exists(path)) {
166                try (InputStream is = Files.newInputStream(path)) {
167                    Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
168                    Map<String, Object> data = yaml.load(is);
169                    if (data != null) {
170                        name = (String) data.get("name");
171                        Object descObj = data.get("description");
172                        description = descObj != null ? descObj.toString().trim() : null;
173                    }
174                }
175            }
176        } catch (Exception e) {
177            logger.warning("ReportBuilder.addWorkflowInfo: Could not read workflow file: " + e.getMessage());
178        }
179
180        addSection(new WorkflowInfoSection(workflowPath, name, description));
181        return new ActionResult(true, "Workflow info section added");
182    }
183
184    /**
185     * Adds JsonState section for specified actor.
186     */
187    private ActionResult addJsonStateSection(String args) {
188        String actorName;
189        String path = "";
190
191        try {
192            JSONObject json = new JSONObject(args);
193            actorName = json.getString("actor");
194            path = json.optString("path", "");
195        } catch (Exception e) {
196            return new ActionResult(false, "Invalid arguments: " + e.getMessage() +
197                ". Expected: {\"actor\": \"name\", \"path\": \"optional\"}");
198        }
199
200        if (system == null) {
201            return new ActionResult(false, "ActorSystem not available");
202        }
203
204        IIActorRef<?> targetActor = system.getIIActor(actorName);
205        if (targetActor == null) {
206            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor not found: " + actorName);
207        }
208
209        JsonState jsonState = targetActor.json();
210        if (jsonState == null) {
211            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor has no JsonState: " + actorName);
212        }
213
214        String yamlContent = jsonState.toStringOfYaml(path);
215        addSection(new JsonStateSection(actorName, yamlContent));
216
217        return new ActionResult(true, "JsonState section added for " + actorName);
218    }
219
220    /**
221     * Builds and outputs the report.
222     */
223    private ActionResult report(String args) {
224        String reportContent = build();
225        reportToMultiplexer(reportContent);
226        return new ActionResult(true, reportContent);
227    }
228
229    // ========================================================================
230    // Core Methods
231    // ========================================================================
232
233    /**
234     * Adds a section to the report.
235     *
236     * @param section the section to add
237     */
238    public void addSection(ReportSection section) {
239        if (section != null) {
240            sections.add(section);
241        }
242    }
243
244    /**
245     * Builds the report string.
246     *
247     * <p>Collects sections from two sources:</p>
248     * <ol>
249     *   <li>Legacy sections added via {@code addWorkflowInfo} and {@code addJsonStateSection}</li>
250     *   <li>Child actor sections implementing {@link SectionBuilder}</li>
251     * </ol>
252     *
253     * @return the formatted report string
254     */
255    public String build() {
256        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
257
258        // Header
259        sb.append("=== Workflow Execution Report ===\n");
260
261        // Collect all sections (both legacy and child actors)
262        List<SectionEntry> allSections = new ArrayList<>();
263
264        // 1. Add legacy sections
265        for (ReportSection section : sections) {
266            allSections.add(new SectionEntry(
267                section.getOrder(),
268                section.getTitle(),
269                section.getContent()
270            ));
271        }
272
273        // 2. Add child actor sections via callByActionName
274        if (selfRef != null && system != null) {
275            Set<String> childNames = selfRef.getNamesOfChildren();
276            for (String childName : childNames) {
277                IIActorRef<?> childRef = system.getIIActor(childName);
278                if (childRef == null) continue;
279
280                // Call generate action on the child
281                ActionResult generateResult = childRef.callByActionName("generate", "");
282                if (!generateResult.isSuccess()) {
283                    // Child doesn't support generate action, skip it
284                    continue;
285                }
286
287                String content = generateResult.getResult();
288                if (content == null || content.isEmpty()) {
289                    continue;
290                }
291
292                // Get order (default 100 if not supported)
293                int order = 100;
294                ActionResult orderResult = childRef.callByActionName("getOrder", "");
295                if (orderResult.isSuccess()) {
296                    try {
297                        order = Integer.parseInt(orderResult.getResult());
298                    } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
299                        // Use default
300                    }
301                }
302
303                // Get title (may be empty)
304                String title = null;
305                ActionResult titleResult = childRef.callByActionName("getTitle", "");
306                if (titleResult.isSuccess()) {
307                    String t = titleResult.getResult();
308                    if (t != null && !t.isEmpty()) {
309                        title = t;
310                    }
311                }
312
313                allSections.add(new SectionEntry(order, title, content));
314            }
315        }
316
317        // Sort sections by order and output
318        allSections.stream()
319            .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(SectionEntry::order))
320            .forEach(entry -> {
321                String content = entry.content();
322                if (content != null && !content.isEmpty()) {
323                    String title = entry.title();
324                    if (title != null && !title.isEmpty()) {
325                        sb.append("\n--- ").append(title).append(" ---\n");
326                    }
327                    sb.append(content).append("\n");
328                }
329            });
330
331        return sb.toString();
332    }
333
334    /**
335     * Internal record to hold section data for sorting.
336     */
337    private record SectionEntry(int order, String title, String content) {}
338
339    // ========================================================================
340    // Helper Methods
341    // ========================================================================
342
343    private String getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup() {
344        if (system == null) return null;
345
346        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = system.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
347        if (nodeGroup == null) return null;
348
349        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getWorkflowPath", "");
350        return result.isSuccess() ? result.getResult() : null;
351    }
352
353    private void reportToMultiplexer(String data) {
354        if (system == null) return;
355
356        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = system.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
357        if (multiplexer == null) return;
358
359        JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
360        arg.put("source", "report-builder");
361        arg.put("type", "plugin-result");
362        arg.put("data", data);
363        multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
364    }
365}
